meanings.definition: A substance used to make something shorter.
meanings.sent1: I added a shortener to the recipe to reduce the cooking time.
meanings.sent2: The tailor used a shortener to hem the pants.
meanings.sent3: The shortener in the drink made it easier to finish quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her efficiency was like a magical shortener, cutting down the time needed for tasks.
meanings.sent5: The shortener in the hair product made her ponytail look perfect in seconds.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that shortens something.
meanings.sent1: The editor was a skilled shortener of long articles.
meanings.sent2: The shortener of the meeting made sure to keep it concise.
meanings.sent3: The comedian was a master shortener of jokes, always getting to the punchline quickly.
meanings.sent4: His wit was like a shortener, trimming unnecessary details from conversations.
meanings.sent5: The shortener in the play condensed the story into a captivating performance.
